changeSet.sql: create table if not exists possession_need ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, active tinyint(1) default 1, need_date datetime null, need_expiration_date datetime null, title varchar(100) null, description varchar(500) null, category varchar(100) null, communication_method varchar(100) null, status varchar(100) null, city_id bigint null, user_id bigint null, image_url varchar(500) null, possession_category_id bigint null, possession_condition_id bigint null, foreign key possession_need_city_id (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), foreign key possession_need_user_id (user_id) REFERENCES user_ (id), foreign key possession_need_possession_category_id (possession_category_id) REFERENCES possession_category (id), foreign key possession_need_possession_condition_id (possession_condition_id) REFERENCES possession_condition (id) );
